description: One hundred percent of the purchase price of this unisex Polo shirt, which is part of Ralph Lauren's exclusive Pride capsule collection, will be donated to Stonewall Community Foundation, benefiting an international network of LGBTQIA+ organizations. To learn more about Stonewall Community Foundation, go to StonewallFoundation.org.
fitting_details: The fit of this unisex Polo shirt is similar to that of Polo Ralph Lauren's men's Custom Slim Fit Polo shirt. It runs approximately two sizes larger than Polo Ralph Lauren's women's Classic Fit Polo shirts.
We suggest customers who typically order Polo Ralph Lauren's women's Classic Fit Polo shirts to order two sizes smaller than their usual size.
Size medium has a 26½" front body length and a 27½" back body length. Body length is taken from the high point of the shoulder.
Rib-knit Polo collar with rainbow tipping. Two-button placket. Short sleeves with rib-knit armbands. Tennis tail.
Signature embroidered rainbow Pony at the left chest. "Together" embroidered at the left sleeve.
